title: Natural and Organic Health Food Store
description: A 100% organic shop carries products that are gluten-free, dairy-free, vegan, soy-free, salt-free, sugar-free, MSG-free, non-dairy, nut-free, kosher and celiac-friendly. Some products include bread and pancakes mixes, dry fruits and superfoods, smoothie blends, non-dairy milks, Bob's Red Mill products, frozen vegan meat alternatives, vegan body products & Vegenaise. Takes bulk orders. Situated opposite Baroud center and Promnade Shopping center and next to Mindful Yoga Studio.
